thread.section_title: InterContinental Paris Le Grand - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great vibe and location - a great stay
thread.title_full: Great vibe and location - a great stay - Review of InterContinental Paris Le Grand, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Martin R
title: Great vibe and location - a great stay
text:
Although we had some initial minor issues with our room (I'm Gold ambassador member in IHG), this was an overall great stay. The friendliness and service orientation of the staff was exceptional. Travelling with our little toddler for the first time this was an overall great experience.
If you can, get a room high up in the building or one facing Rue Scribe, as the other are facing rather trafficked boulevards. Breakfast buff√© is well above average and worth the extra spend.
Room Tip: Get a room high up or on the more quite Rue Scribe See more room tips
